LanguageData.Ammo_9M311_SAM.label: 9M311 Treugol'nik Missile (SAM)
LanguageData.Ammo_9M311_SAM.description: The 9M311 "Treugol'nik" is a Russian surface to air missile (SAM), is designed to engage in the visual visibility of aircraft and helicopters at speed up to 500m/s.
LanguageData.Bullet_9M311_SAM.label: 9M311 Treugol'nik Missile (SAM)
